# mPropertyDataType

**Instance Property**

The data type of the of the custom property’s data.

## Declaration

```swift
IOUserAudioCustomPropertyDataType mPropertyDataType;
```

## Property Metadata

- **mSelector**: The property selector of the custom property.
- **mQualifierDataType**: The data type of the of the custom property’s qualifier data.
